sentences.en: Additionally, a marked decrease in retention after long - term use is described.
sentences.cn: 此外, 在 长期 的使用以后套筒冠的固位力可能有显著地下降.

sentences.en: After your nap, repeat the memory technique once more for maximum retention.
sentences.cn: 小睡一会儿后, 再一次重复这一技巧以求最大化记忆.

sentences.en: Article 11 Joint exposure information for the duration of retention of permanent.
sentences.cn: 第十一条联合曝光信息的保留期限为永久.

sentences.en: Besides contributing to retention, sodium can raise your blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 除了有助于保持水分外, 钠可提高你的血压.

sentences.en: Extended breath retention may have to be modified to meet your needs.
sentences.cn: 延长呼吸保持力,不得不按照你的实际情况而有所调整.

sentences.en: He argues strongly for retention of NATO as a guarantee of peace.
sentences.cn: 他强烈要求保留北大西洋公约组织以维护和平。

sentences.en: High energy environment are not conducive to the retention of organic matter in muds.
sentences.cn: 高能量环境不利于有机物在软泥中的保存.

sentences.en: Many people with heart problems suffer from fluid retention.
sentences.cn: 很多有心脏病的人都有体液潴留。

sentences.en: Objective To increase the retention and stability of traditional removable partial denture.
sentences.cn: 目的:改进常规可摘局部义齿设计的不足,增进固位、稳定.

sentences.en: Shape retention is a factor in almost all articles made from polymeric materials.
sentences.cn: 形状保持性是所有聚合物材料制品共有的因素.

sentences.en: The Citizens' Forum supported special powers for Quebec but also argued for the retention of a strong central government.
sentences.cn: 《市民论坛》支持魁北克的特殊权力，但是也主张保留一个强有力的中央政府。

sentences.en: The company needs to improve its training and retention of staff.
sentences.cn: 公司需要改进对员工的培训和留用工作。

sentences.en: The primary purpose is retention of electrical insulation and low - loss properties after extensive exposure to water.
sentences.cn: 主要目的在于在强烈侵水后保持其电的绝缘性以及其他性能降低较少.

sentences.en: The use of seat screws as a retention method is prohibited.
sentences.cn: 禁止采用阀座螺丝作为固定阀座的方法.

sentences.en: They advocate the retention of our nuclear power plants.
sentences.cn: 他们主张保留我们的核电厂.

sentences.en: This overall deterioration in soil structure is usually accompanied by a reduced nutrient retention capacity.
sentences.cn: 这种土壤结构的全面恶化,通常伴随着养份保持能力的降低.

sentences.en: This quantity describes the retention of particles in a porous substance.
sentences.cn: 这个参数描述阻留在多孔体中的微粒量.
